# This command takes the currently selected word and displays the python documentation for the module corresponding to said word.
# change to /tmp to avoid possibly overwriting # an html file in the working directory.
# if no selected text, try the current word if test ${#TM_SELECTED_TEXT} -eq 0; then TM_SELECTED_TEXT=${TM_CURRENT_WORD}; export TM_SELECTED_TEXT; fi
cd /tmp pydoc -w "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT" cat "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT".html rm "$TM_SELECTED_TEXT".html
